data_table.description: Form 85 - Mammogram -- summary results, follow-up results. This form was not required for OS participants, but was included for OS if available. This dataset now also includes data collected from Extension form 85s. Note: The rel# in the file name is used by the submitter to track embargo releases. Files that have "rel2" or later may either contain additional variables or more recent data as compared to the previous rel#.

variable.name: F85VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: REVIEWDY
variable.description: Days from randomization to mammogram report review

variable.name: RTBRST
variable.comment: Summary of mammogram report (Mark one.) Right Not collected on all versions of Form 85.

variable.name: LTBRST
variable.comment: Summary of mammogram report (Mark one.) Left Not collected on all versions of Form 85.

variable.name: FUREFER
variable.comment: Was a referral made for follow-up care (mammogram)? Not collected on version of Form 85 used for the WHI extension.

variable.name: REFERDY
variable.description: Days from randomization to mammogram referral
variable.comment:
Sub-question of F85 V3 Q10 'Referral made for follow-up'.
Not collected on version of Form 85 used for the WHI extension.

variable.name: MAMREPET
variable.comment:
Not collected on all versions of Form 85.
Not collected on version of Form 85 used for the WHI extension.

variable.name: RFURESLT
variable.comment:
Not collected on all versions of Form 85.
Not collected on version of Form 85 used for the WHI extension.

variable.name: LFURESLT
variable.comment:
Not collected on all versions of Form 85.
Not collected on version of Form 85 used for the WHI extension.
